title: I've same issue like below. How was it fixed? https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/54201443
content:
I am facing issue very similar to the one described in the link below.
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/54201443
My pixel battery has started to drain overnight since the day I have changed my home wifi router and broadband provider.
When I switch off wifi on my phone before going to bed, then, there is no draining overnight.
I am interested to know how this issue was fixed as mentioned by Ryan T 317 that issue is related to firewall hw in the router.
Device is Google pixel
